# mukoko weather

> AI-powered weather intelligence platform for Zimbabwe. Real-time weather data, 7-day forecasts, frost alerts, and AI-generated contextual advice for farming, mining, travel, and daily life across 90+ Zimbabwe locations. Built by Nyuchi Africa (PVT) Ltd.

mukoko weather provides hyperlocal weather data for Zimbabwe, a country underserved by global weather platforms. The AI assistant "Shamwari Weather" generates contextual advice tailored to user activities (farming, mining, travel, tourism, sports, casual) using the Ubuntu philosophy.

## Coverage

90+ Zimbabwe locations across all 10 provinces, including major cities, farming regions, mining areas, tourism sites, national parks, border posts, and education centres.

## Data Sources

- **Tomorrow.io** (primary weather provider): Real-time forecasts, hourly and daily data
- **Open-Meteo** (fallback): Free weather API, 7-day forecasts
- **Anthropic Claude** (AI summaries): Context-aware weather advice via Shamwari Weather

## Features

- Current conditions with feels-like temperature
- 24-hour hourly forecasts with temperature and rain probability charts
- 7-day daily forecasts with high/low temperature trends
- Frost alerts for agriculture (temps <= 3C between 10pm-8am)
- Atmospheric details: humidity, wind, pressure, UV index, cloud cover
- AI-generated weather summaries personalised to user activities
- Activity insights for farming (GDD), mining (heat stress), travel (driving conditions), tourism (photography), sports (fitness), casual (comfort)
- Historical weather data dashboard with multi-day charts and statistics
- Zimbabwe seasonal calendar: Masika (rainy), Chirimo (cool dry), Zhizha (hot), Munakamwe (post-rainy)
- Dark mode with system preference detection
- Embeddable weather widget
